glosses: causative of kaçmak: to make or cause to flee

examples.translation: Did you let the cat flee?
I can't believe I've missed the bus, it was the last one!

glosses: to gatekeep, to avoid to show

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قاچرمق (kaçırmak). By surface analysis, kaç- (“to flee”) + -ır (causative suffix).
